about_the_game:
Daughter of Crone tells the story of a troubled young witch named Eyfrid who lives with her teacher in their secluded forest hut. Since witchcraft is illegal, the old witch Gudrun is masquerading as a healer. Away from the curious eyes of the villagers and the vindictive village priest, Eyfrid has been learning the secret art of magic under her guidance.

However, Eyfrid's peaceful life is about to change. Soon she must venture out to the world alone, navigate through relationships, prejudice and the whims of a tyrant king while an ancient evil prepares to descend upon the world. To prevail against her many enemies, she must not only master her skills in spellcraft but make difficult choices that will determine the fate of the world.

About the demo

The demo shows you the beginning of Eyfrid's adventure. You can explore your home area, Vilgesby Forest, West Vilgesby and the swamp. You are introduced to the core features of the game and a few NPC:s. The playtime is between 15-60 minutes.

content_descriptors.notes: Game has themes that may not be appropriate to all ages, such as references to social issues, mental health problems and sexuality.

To prevail against her many enemies, she must not only master her skills in spellcraft but make difficult choices that will determine the fate of the world.

short_description: Take the role of a young witch named Eyfrid and master the ways of magic. Learn to cast spells, brew magical potions, and explore the mystical kingdom of Ervein. It is up to you to shape the destiny of Eyfrid, the Daughter of Crone.
